meanings.definition: To make French in character or style.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant francized its menu by adding escargot and coq au vin.
meanings.sent2: She francized her wardrobe by wearing berets and striped shirts.
meanings.sent3: The dog francized itself by barking with a French accent.
meanings.sent4: The garden was francized with lavender and rosemary, giving it a French flair.
meanings.sent5: The room was francized with paintings of the Eiffel Tower and Parisian cafes.

meanings.definition: To adapt to French tastes or customs.
meanings.sent1: The movie was francized for the French audience by adding subtitles.
meanings.sent2: He francized his greeting by kissing both cheeks instead of shaking hands.
meanings.sent3: The cat francized its behavior by demanding croissants for breakfast.
meanings.sent4: Her style was francized with a chic Parisian scarf, completing her look.
meanings.sent5: The music was francized with accordion melodies, giving it a French touch.
